main event: A large, brilliant silver circular object was sighted on 17 November 1954, causing interference on a car radio as it darted across the sky.
interesting points: The object appeared to rotate as it moved through the sky.
It caused interference on a car radio, indicating potential electromagnetic effects.
The sighting lasted for approximately 1 minute.
Despite the compelling nature of the sighting, there is no further information or investigation on file.
